app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online. Table S1. Summary of studies on bioactivities of Rh. tomentosum Harmaja (ex Ledum palustre L.) extracts, essential oils, or emitted volatiles. Figure S1. Geographical indication of Rh. tomentosum sampling site in Eastern Lithuania (Utena district). Figure S2. TROLOX standard calibration curves: (a) ABTS • + assay; (b) DPPH • assay.
